items.answer: We accommodate both small batch and large volume orders, with flexible MOQ based on component complexity and material specifications.

items.answer: Standard lead times range from 2-4 weeks depending on component complexity, with expedited options available for urgent requirements.

items.answer: We maintain ISO 9001:2015 and ISO 14001:2015 certifications, with rigorous quality control processes and advanced CNC precision machining.

items.answer: We specialize in brass, stainless steel, aluminum, and copper, providing comprehensive material expertise for diverse industrial applications.

aboutusintro.title: About Momai Brass
aboutusintro.subtitle: Precision Manufacturing Pioneers
aboutusintro.description: Founded in Rajkot with a branch in Jamnagar, Momai Brass has been a leading precision components manufacturer for three decades. We specialize in producing high-quality parts for automotive, pneumatic, and industrial applications using advanced CNC machining technologies.

items.name: Rajesh Patel
items.content: Momai Brass consistently delivers exceptional precision components that meet our stringent automotive manufacturing requirements.

items.name: Sameer Mehta
items.content: Their technical expertise and advanced CNC capabilities make them our preferred precision parts manufacturing partner.
